snippet.title: Kathy Griffin doesn't look like this anymore
snippet.content:
KATHY Griffin is standing by her cancer-stricken sister. On Monday, photos of Griffin, 56, surfaced on social media after she shaved her head in support of her sibling, who is battling cancer. "My daughter Kathleen Mary is a wonderful human being," the comedian's mom, Maggie Griffin, Most recently, the TV personality after posing in a disturbing photo shoot in which she held up a fake severed head that resembled President Trump. As a result, Griffin was , which she co-hosted alongside The fallout was so severe, Griffin was even briefly under federal investigation - this week she tweeted confirmation that the investigation had finished.
TODAY. The has to clarify. I am no longer under federal investigation. The case is closed, I have been completely exonerated. Finally.
This isn't the first time cancer has affected Griffin's family. Her brother, Gary Griffin, succumbed to his with esophageal cancer in 2014. This story originally appeared on the New York Post and is republished here with permission. Originally published as
